title: My Locale
name: My Locale
description:
A Map by Eberlin

Places that I like to visit near my home.

properties.name: Bathford Village Shop
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin  Local community village shop. Run by the villagers. Local, freshly baked Hobbs House bread, Marshfield bakery & Ice Cream, croissants at the weekend etc. Post Office too.

properties.name: Blackstones Kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin

properties.name: Dyrham Park
properties.description: Posted by EberlinNational Trust property. Good walks, interesting house and deer in the park. They filmed Ishiguro\'s Remains of the Day here (with Anthony Hopkins and Emma Thompson)

properties.name: Fat Fowl
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin Very good restauarnt in Bradford on Avon. Menus are created based seasonality. Always well cooked and always attentive service.

properties.name: Fopp
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin

properties.name: Great Chalfield Manor
properties.description: Posted by EberlinHad a lovely walk around the byways over the weekend. The gardens were open on Sunday. We sat by the water and looked at the daffodils. Spring.

properties.name: Monkton Farleigh
properties.description: Posted by EberlinBeautiful village where we like to take Monty for a walk. The fete in June at the posh house is quintessential England.

properties.name: Northey Arms, Box
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin As good food as the Pear Tree at Whitley. The food is a little more formal, but the atmosphere is still relaxed.

properties.name: Pear Tree at Whitley
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin Wiltshire Dining Pub of the year according to The Good Pub Guide, and they are right. Excellent food and nice surroundings.

properties.name: Rajpoot
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin Best Indian restaurant in the area. Consistently good for the last 15 years and over.

properties.name: Salamander
properties.description: Posted by EberlinJohn Street, Bath, EnglandA great pub in the centre of Bath that serves locally brewed Bath Ales. Gem is my favourite.

properties.name: Sausage Shop
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin

properties.name: South Wraxall
properties.description: Posted by EberlinAnother of our favourite walks with Monty. Beautiful Wiltshire village.

properties.name: Straight Hair Company
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin

properties.name: Thai Barn
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin The best Thai restaurant in the area.

properties.name: The Old Green Tree
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin

properties.name: The Real Italian Ice Cream Company
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin The best ice cream in Bath. Not far from the Roman Baths and the abbey. They also sell delicious Leonadis Belgian chocolates.

properties.name: The Star
properties.description: Posted by EberlinAle straight from the barrel, into a jug and into the glass. No added CO2.

properties.name: The Toll House
properties.description: Posted by Eberlin Excellent Tea House between the M4 and Bath. Welsh rarebit, cream teas and traditional puddings. There is always too much to try and so little room in my tummy.
